page.title: The Rebels
page.text: (!size/20px/BonBonnet)(!size/15px/ - Designer) (!line) (!size/20px/PichuZapper) (!size/15px/ - Director, Animator, Composer, Coder) (!line) (!size/20px/Blue Ender)(!size/15px/ - Animator, Composer, Coder) (!line)(!line) (!size/20px/Limezic)(!size/15px/ - Original Director and Composer of Voltage) (!line) (!size/20px/ManualH)(!size/15px/ - Additional Bonus Animator) (!line)(!line) (!button/#8f1e22/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@bonbonnet2411//BonBonnet) (!button/#8f1e22/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@pichuzapper//PichuZapper) (!button/#8f1e22/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@BlueEnder_//Blue Ender) (!line) (!button/#8f1e22/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@Limezic//Limezic) (!button/#8f1e22/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@ManuelH2500/videos//ManualH)

page.title: Special Thanks!
page.text: Incredibox Modding Build created with passion by (!color/#64b1e8/(!bold/Rem))! Love creative mods and unique sounds? Support her work and explore more on her channel! (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line) (!button/#8f1e22/social_youtube.png/https://www.youtube.com/@rin.Incredibox//Rem's Channel)

page.title: INCREDIBOX BY SO FAR SO GOOD!
page.text: And of corse the official developers of Incredibox, (!bold/Allan), (!bold/Romain) and Incredible (!bold/Polo)! Without them, this project wouldn't exist! (!line)(!line)(!hr)(!line)Buy Official Incredibox for more fun and to support the team!(!line)(!line)(!button/#4A4A4A/sfsg-credits-button.png/https://www.incredibox.com//Incredibox Website)(!button/#4A4A4A/sfsg-credits-button.png/https://www.incredibox.com/info/store/Buy Incredibox)
